title: Ford Maverick Owners Club
summary: Connect with Maverick drivers, swap build tips, and join adventures across the country.
content:
Built for Every Journey

Celebrate the capability and creativity of Ford Maverick owners with resources, regional convoys, and a welcoming crew of enthusiasts.

Join the Club Find an Event

Why Maverick Drivers Choose Us

Community Drives

Lead and join curated trail runs, scenic cruises, and city meetups tailored for Maverick capabilities and comfort.

Garage Support

Access step-by-step build guides, torque specs, and accessory reviews to personalize your truck responsibly.

Member Perks

Unlock discounts from trusted aftermarket partners plus early registration for limited-capacity adventures.

Share Your Build Story

Submit your Maverick photos and modifications to inspire the community and spotlight creative solutions.

Explore Build Guides

title: About the Maverick Club
summary: Learn how the Ford Maverick Club supports owners with inclusive events, safety-first culture, and trusted partners.
content:
Our Story

Founded by early Maverick adopters, the club brings together city commuters, weekend adventurers, and DIY builders who love this adaptable truck.

We organize accessible experiences with clear trail ratings, inclusive convoys, and mentorship for new owners. Safety briefings, radio etiquette, and recovery know-how keep every outing welcoming for drivers of all skill levels.

Mission

Celebrate the versatility of the Ford Maverick while modelling responsible modifications, environmental stewardship, and community service.

Vision

Become the most helpful network for Maverick owners worldwide by sharing trustworthy knowledge and creating unforgettable memories together.

Values

  • Respect every driver and passenger.
  • Prioritize safety and accessibility on every route.
  • Give back through charity convoys and volunteer days.

Leadership Team

Jordan Ellis, President

Trail leader and certified recovery instructor who ensures every convoy is briefed, prepared, and inclusive.

Priya Thompson, Technical Director

Engineer documenting torque specs, wiring tips, and troubleshooting guides tailored to Maverick trims.

Luis Ramirez, Community Liaison

Coordinates partner discounts, charity collaborations, and new-member onboarding support.
meta_description: Discover the Ford Maverick Club mission, leadership team, and values that power our inclusive owner community.
og_description: Discover the Ford Maverick Club mission, leadership team, and values that power our inclusive owner community.

title: Maverick Events & Convoys
summary: Reserve your spot for Ford Maverick meetups, convoy cruises, workshops, and volunteer service days.
content:
Upcoming Events

Every gathering includes ADA-friendly parking, accessible restrooms, and clearly posted radio channels so every participant feels confident.

Ford Maverick Club upcoming events with dates, locations, and highlights.
Date Event Location Highlights
September 14 Blue Oval Canyon Cruise Moab, UT Guided scenic drive, recovery demo, inclusive trail options.
October 5 City Utility Build Night Austin, TX Hands-on accessories workshop with electrical safety stations.
November 9 Harvest Haul Charity Drive Grand Rapids, MI Food bank deliveries, convoy etiquette refresher, family-friendly.

Event Resources

Convoy Checklist

Download our printable checklist covering tire pressures, radio settings, first-aid kits, and ADA accommodations.

Code of Conduct

We promote inclusive language, pace cars for varied driving comfort, and zero-tolerance policies for unsafe behavior.

Volunteer Team

Certified marshals and wellness ambassadors are on-site to answer questions and coordinate accessible support.

Host a Regional Meetup

Submit your route, accessibility plan, and local partners to bring the Maverick Club to your hometown.

Email the Events Team
meta_description: Plan your next Ford Maverick adventure with convoys, workshops, and service drives hosted by the Maverick Club.

title: Membership Benefits
summary: See what you receive with Ford Maverick Club membership, including resources, partner perks, and mentorship.
content:
Membership Tiers

All tiers include respectful moderation, captioned livestreams, and accessible documentation so every driver can participate fully.

Crew Access

Join the members-only forum, monthly Q&A calls, and build galleries curated for daily drivers.

Trail Ready

Add guided off-road sessions, recovery training, and exclusive partner discounts on lift kits and tires.

Pro Builder

Access CAD templates, wiring diagrams, and quarterly mastermind workshops led by Maverick experts.

How to Join

  1. Complete the online application with your Maverick trim and accessibility needs.
  2. Choose a membership tier and secure checkout via our encrypted portal.
  3. Schedule an onboarding call to review club guidelines and upcoming opportunities.
Apply Now

Member Testimonials

“I joined to learn about overlanding setups and stayed for the friends who help me wrench safely.” — Casey, XL Hybrid
“The club’s accessibility guidelines made our first family convoy stress-free and fun.” — Morgan, Lariat FX4
“Partner discounts paid for my bed rack upgrade in months.” — Devon, XLT Tremor
meta_description: Compare Ford Maverick Club membership tiers, perks, and the simple steps to join our supportive owner community.
og_description: Compare Ford Maverick Club membership tiers, perks, and the simple steps to join our supportive owner community.

title: Maverick Build Guides
summary: Browse curated Ford Maverick modifications with safety notes, tools lists, and inclusive best practices.
content:
Featured Build Guides

Each guide includes torque specs, required tools, and callouts for adaptive equipment to keep projects safe for every builder.

Hybrid Overlanding Setup

Lightweight rooftop tent, portable power, and recovery gear designed to preserve MPG without sacrificing comfort.

Trail-Friendly Lift

Step-by-step suspension upgrade with alignment tips, torque specs, and ride height comparisons.

Workday Utility Build

Modular bed storage, in-bed power expansions, and lighting upgrades built for job-site productivity.

Photo Inspiration

Submit Your Build

Share photos, parts lists, and accessibility notes so fellow Maverick owners can learn from your experience.

Email the Tech Team

title: Contact the Maverick Club
summary: Reach the Ford Maverick Club leadership for membership questions, media inquiries, or partnership opportunities.
content:
We Would Love to Hear From You

Send us a message and a club ambassador will respond within two business days with clear next steps.

Contact Details

Email: hello@maverickclub.com

Phone: (833) 555-1234

Mailing Address: Ford Maverick Club, 1200 Trailhead Ave, Denver, CO 80202

Media Inquiries: press@maverickclub.com

Send a Message

Office Hours

Club volunteers monitor the inbox Monday through Friday, 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Mountain Time.

Emergency event assistance is available via the convoy radio channel posted in your registration email.
meta_description: Get in touch with the Ford Maverick Club leadership team for membership support, partnerships, and media requests.
